name: catalyst-gcpproj
description: Manages a GCP Project for a Catalyst application.

scripts.install:
cp ./src/completion.sh /usr/local/etc/bash_completion.d/gcproj; echo '
[ -d /usr/local/etc/bash_completion.d ] && . /usr/local/etc/bash_completion.d/*' >> ~/.bash_profile; echo 'You must open a new shell or execute ". /usr/local/etc/bash_completion.d/gcproj" for to enable completion.'

author: Zane Rockenbaugh <zane@liquid-labs.com>
